text: hello this is chef john from food wishes

alright so there's not much prep to do

we have oranges around and of course you

so my zest is done next up I'm gonna

we're gonna peel that all the way around
then we're gonna cut it in half of
course we're gonna take the stem off and

the boss

and we're really not gonna do much

once in a while all comes up to a simmer
and if you've never made fresh cranberry

gonna start popping as those berries
heat up they expand and explode most of
it happens under the surface so you'll
hear those bursting underneath but once
in a while one will burst on the surface
so be a little careful don't have your
face like right over the pot which is
just good advice when you're cooking
anyway
all right because here's what can happen
check it out so anyway no problem it's

continue to keep cooking stirring
occasionally until all those berries
basically pop there's always gonna be a
handful of stubborn ones that don't

just smash those with the spoon but it's
not a big deal by the time this is
stirred and cooled and stirred again and

major deal but if you see a couple
berries you can just smash them against

at that point you're simply gonna turn

all right this is not a sauce you want
